posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I’m trying to help a good friend who’s a big genealogy buff and has traced his roots to find out Anson Mott is family. He’s not a big baseball card guy but he really wants to own the card for obvious reasons.

Curious if anyone here has his Obak T212 “old” #52 , T212 175 #113 or T4 #113 card (in any condition) available for sale.

Thanks!
